author: Jack Horgan-Jones
title: Coronavirus test backlog: How did it emerge and can it be controlled?
description: State’s strategy for controlling Covid-19 has put unprecedented pressure on our virus testing system
content:
Widespread testing for coronavirus is among the key pillars of the Governments plan to slow the spread of the pandemic in Ireland.
With a backlog of 40,000 people awaiting a test, to succeed, the States success hinges on a plan to ramp up the testing capacit… [+4367 chars]
